/*1<=n, m<=100
1<=t<=1000000000 */
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long a[100][100];
long long minimum=1000000000;
int main() {
    vector<long long>v;
	int n,m;
	cin>>n>>m;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
	    for(int j=0;j<m;j++)
	    {
	        cin>>a[i][j];
	        minimum=min(a[i][j],minimum);
	    }
	    v.push_back(minimum);
	    minimum=1000000000;
	}
    sort(v.begin(),v.end());
    cout<<v[v.size()-1]<<endl;
	return 0;
}
